name: Dynasty Heroes: Romance Samkok
description:
Experiencing the most excited battle in game! Dynasty Heroes: Romance Samkok is based on 6v6 strategic RPG card game, you will command more than hundreds warriors in game and dominate your own destiny to write your history!


【Game Features】

-Free Draws Login to Claim-
Login to claim 100 Free draws during certain period! Login for 7 days to claim SSR Warrior! Free Ingots and Resources awaits in game! Complete 14 days' tasks to claim UR Warrior!


-Goddess Arrive to Form Your Unique Team-
Massive heroines with Live2D actions! Both beauties and lands are in your arms!


-Casting Spells With Stunning graphic-
Over hundreds Warriors with hundreds spells are waiting for you to collect! Exclusive Combo Skill system brings new possibility to the battlefield!


-Speed-Up Battle! Better Experience!-
More efficiency battle looting! More faster collecting resources! 10 times faster than before which you can experience in Dynasty Heroes: Romance Samkok!


Contact us:
